title: Coronavirus Updates -  CDC Vaccination Priorities, SantaCon Gets Canceled & Belgium's Bathroom Rule
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates -  CDC Vaccination Priorities, SantaCon Gets Canceled & Belgium's Bathroom Rule
description:
The CDC prioritizes recipients of COVID-19 vaccines, the SantaCon pub crawl is canceled due to pandemic concerns, and Belgium regulates bathroom use at parties.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
